title: QlueDashboard
desc: QlueDashboard takes the pain away from leaders having to analyze multiple platforms and dashboards to understand their businesses and/or organizations. QlueDashboard gives leaders a single platform to make sense of all the information in their organization, enabling them to find data correlations, conduct seamless integrations, manage issues, and monitor the mobile workforce.

title: LOKASI Intelligence
desc: LOKASI Intelligence integrates GIS Software, Big data, Analytics, and machine learning. LOKASI is able to Visualize, Analyze and Optimize the business into a one-stop integrated platform.

title: iPlaces App
desc: iPlaces is sharing, review and recommendation web app, view on geospatial location/maps. iPlaces created on individual project on Phase 2 Hacktiv8.

title: Marugame Udon Site Clone
desc: Marugame Udon Site Clone is a project on phase 3 Hacktiv8, this website has build with react js, react router and redux, this project has CMS for managing the content site.
